headline: 3 Energy Partnerships Crushing It on Dividend Growth
summary: In the market, high yields are easy to find in the energy space, but dividend growth is a whole different story. Any partnership can throw out an 8% yield by simply distributing most of its cash flow. However, what about those that can raise their distributions year after year? It’s these energy partnerships that are ... 3 Energy Partnerships Crushing It on Dividend Growth

headline: Petrobras Suspends Drilling After Offshore Fluid Leak Incident
summary: PBR halts drilling at the Morpho well after a fluid leak, suspending Foz do Amazonas Basin operations for up to 15 days under Ibama monitoring.

headline: Jim Cramer Says Refiners Like Valero as Potential Winners From Venezuelan Oil
summary: Valero Energy Corporation (NYSE:VLO) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer offered insights on. Cramer highlighted the company while discussing the opportunity for US refiners, as he stated: “The US refiners, especially Valero, may be a big beneficiary of that oil because they still have refineries that can handle what’s known as heavy crude.
